title: Compare: Side-by-side score comparison chart
description: Add a visual chart comparing baseline and candidate scores across all cases or scorers. Helps users quickly see the overall picture of changes.
acceptance_criteria: Bar chart or grouped bar chart
Shows baseline vs candidate score per scorer type
Or: per case (if manageable number of cases)
Baseline bars in one color, candidate in another
Optional: can toggle between by-scorer and by-case views
implementation_notes: Use Recharts BarChart with grouped bars
Keep it simple - focus on actionable insight
May skip if run has too many cases (>20)
